product_name: AMC Sea Kayaking Along the New England Coast - 2nd Edition
long_description: This updated and expanded edition of the AMC's classic guide leads adventurous kayakers on 47 trips along the magnificent New England coastline. Author: Tamsin Venn. Softcover; 350 pages; maps, black-and-white photos. Appalachian Mountain Club; copyright 2004. Kayakers of all abilities can explore sandy beaches, bird-watch in marshes, tour solitary estuaries or challenge their skills along wild shorelines. Each trip description includes a detailed map, NOAA chart and map references, trip distance, caution areas, access points and more. New interior design makes finding the right trip even easier. Locator maps and at-a-glance trip highlights chart for easy planning. Tips on equipment, navigation, safety and more.
short_description: This updated and expanded edition of the AMC's classic guide leads adventurous kayakers on 47 trips along the magnificent New England coastline.
